name: Schmarble Schmadness
description:
A Marble Madness clone, developed as part of the Games Programming course at Flensburg University of Applied Sciences. I used this build to show off my game at our in-house-exhibition!

It features 3 levels, secret collectibles and a tiny proc-gen-demo!

This is the first Unity game I have developed, and as such expect a few bugs. Nonetheless, I am pretty proud of this game, and the things I have learned while working on it! I hope you enjoy playing it!
